title: Inside The New York Times Book Review: ‘How to Be a Person in the World’
description: Heather Havrilesky discusses her new collection of advice columns, and Jessica Winter talks about her debut novel, “Break in Case of Emergency.”
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
